doc.entry: Represents a control for selecting amongst a set of options.
This is a CSS styling attribute as defined by the CSS Styling Attribute Syntax specification.
The attribute, if specified, must have a value that is a set of space-separated tokens representing the various classes that the element belongs to.
Represents a group of option elements with a common label.

Represents an option in a select element. In certain circumstances, an option element can be a placeholder label option. A placeholder label option does not represent an actual option, but instead represents a label.

Represents an option in a select element. In certain circumstances, an option element can be a placeholder label option. A placeholder label option does not represent an actual option, but instead represents a label.
